item.title: ::getid Command
item.dc:creator: @Andy1993 Andy1993
item.description:
@Andy1993 wrote:

This is simpler GetID command.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("getid") && c.playerRights == 3) { String a[] = playerCommand.split(" "); String name = ""; int results = 0; for(int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) name = name + a[i]+ " "; name = name.substring(0, name.length()-1); c.sendMessage("Searching: " + name); for (int j = 0; j < Server.itemHandler.ItemList.length; j++) { if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null) if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ").toLowerCase().contains(name.toLowerCase())) { c.sendMessage("<col=255>" + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ") + " - " + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId); results++; } } c.sendMessage(results + " results found..."); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::getid Command
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

This is mainly ripped from a source I was using, but I’ve edited it so that it doesn’t spam your chatbox. Here it is.

if(playerCommand.startsWith("getid") && c.playerRights >= 2) { String a[] = playerCommand.split(" "); String name = ""; int results = 8145; for(int i = 1; i < a.length; i++) name = name + a[i]+ " "; name = name.substring(0, name.length()-1); c.sendMessage("Searching: " + name); for (int j = 0; j < Server.itemHandler.ItemList.length; j++) { if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j] != null) if (Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ").toLowerCase().contains(name.toLowerCase())) { c.getPA().showInterface(8134); c.getPA().sendFrame126("Close Window", 8136); c.getPA().sendFrame126("GetID List", 8144); c.getPA().sendFrame126("@dbl@" + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemName.replace("_", " ") + " - " + Server.itemHandler.ItemList[j].itemId, results); results++; } } c.sendMessage(results + " results found..."); }

This command when used correctly, will open up an interface with a list of items containing the word you searched. (Item name) - (Item Id)

Read full topic
